name: PKY - Please Kill Yourself
description:
The Devil's running out of time to meet his soul quota for the month, so he sends you; a new fledgling demon, to the realm of the mortals to forc- errrr... "nudge", as many of them into committing suicide as possible before you're returned to Hell.

Possess a mortal, make them die in a horrible way, rinse and repeat.

Even a brainless newbie demon like yourself should be able to do that.

- Submitted for the Newbies 2 Game Jam
